script.name: plugin.shopping.cmd.menu
script.sourceplaintext:
$page.id = get global variable: name='pageid.guilds' $table.data = get global variable: name='shoppinglist.data' $table.settings = $a.obj -> get local variable: name='shoppinglist.settings'
if $a.event == [MEvent.Start] if not $table.settings $table.settings = table alloc $table.settings['range'] = 20 $a.obj ->set local variable: name='shoppinglist.settings' value=$table.settings end $table.data = table alloc set global variable: name='shoppinglist.data' value=$table.data gosub sub.BuildMenu return $input
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Returned] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $menu.id == 'shopping.menu' if $selection == 'add.new' if $value if not $table.data[$value] if not $a.obj -> can transport ware $value START speak text: page=[Page.MiscVoice] id=32 priority=50 $ware.tc = get transport class of ware $value $text = get short transport class name: class=$ware.tc $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=3098, $text, null, null, null, null display game tip: text=$read.text delay=0 else gosub sub.ComputeCargo $ware.vol = get volume of ware $value if $ware.vol > $cargo.free START speak text: page=[Page.MiscVoice] id=32 priority=50 $text = convert number $ware.vol to string $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=3100, $text, null, null, null, null display game tip: text=$read.text delay=0 else $table.data[$value] = 1 gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu end end end end end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Select] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[3] if $menu.id == 'shopping.menu' if is datatype[ $selection ] == DATATYPE_WARE if not $value remove key $selection from table $table.data else $table.data[$selection] = $value end play sample [Sound.Success] gosub sub.BuildMenu $input = create input return value: update menu=$menu return $input
else if is datatype[ $selection ] == DATATYPE_STRING $ware = get ware from subtype name $selection if $ware $table.prices = $table.settings['prices'] $table.prices[$ware] = $value gosub sub.BuildMenu play sample [Sound.Success] $input = create input return value: update menu=$menu return $input end end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Hotkey] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $menu.id == 'shopping.menu' if $selection == 'ware.id' if is datatype[ $value ] == DATATYPE_WARE $input = create input: id='ware.id' encyclopedia page, ware=$value return $input end end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Switch] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $menu.id == 'shopping.menu' if $selection == 'cont' if $value $table.settings[$selection] = $value else remove key $selection from table $table.settings end gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu else if $selection == 'return' if $value $table.settings[$selection] = $value else remove key $selection from table $table.settings end else if $selection == 'price.type' $table.settings[$selection] = $value gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu else $table.settings[$selection] = $value end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Arguments] $default = $table.settings['cont'] skip if $default $default = [FALSE] $jumps = $table.settings['range'] $limit = $table.settings['limit'] skip if $limit $limit = 0 dec $limit = $return = $table.settings['return'] skip if $return $return = [FALSE] $price.type = $table.settings['price.type']
if $price.type == 2 $table.prices = $table.settings['prices'] skip if $table.prices $table.prices = table alloc $table.prices = clone table $table.prices $ware = get next key: table=$table.data key=null $homebase = $a.obj -> get homebase while $ware $max.price = 0 do if $homebase -> exists $max.price = $homebase -> get price of ware $ware skip if $max.price $max.price = get max price of ware $ware $table.prices[$ware] = $max.price $ware = get next key: table=$table.data key=$ware end else if $price.type == 1 $table.prices = $table.settings['prices'] else $table.prices = table alloc end
$ret = create new array, size=5, elements=$table.data, $default, $jumps, $table.prices, $return, null, null, null return $ret
else if $a.event == 'shopping.menu' do if is datatype[ $a.data ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $a.data = $a.data[0] if $a.data == 'start.cmd' return [TRUE] end
else if $a.event == 'add.new' $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3098 $input = create input: id='add.new', user input=Var/Available Ware, refobj=$a.obj, description=$read.text, without sector=[TRUE], filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=null, default=null return $input end return null
sub.BuildMenu: $menu = create custom menu array
$values.yesno = array alloc: size=2 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102302 $values.yesno[0] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102301 $values.yesno[1] = $read.text $default = $table.settings['cont'] skip if $default $default = 0 $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3094 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$read.text, value array=$values.yesno, default=$default, return id='cont', width=80 allowtabs=[FALSE] if $default $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3095 else $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3096 end $read.text = sprintf: fmt='(%s)', $read.text, null, null, null, null $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=0 right=[TRUE] colour=[MenuColour.Disabled] text=$read.text add extra select line: menu=$menu, text=$text
$text.values = array alloc: size=31 $i = 0 while $i < 31 $text = convert number $i to string $text.values[$i] = $text inc $i = end $default = $table.settings['range'] $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3101 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$read.text, value array=$text.values, default=$default, return id='range', width=80 allowtabs=[FALSE] add section to custom menu: $menu
$homebase = $a.obj -> get homebase
$text.values = array alloc: size=3 $text.values[0] = 'Disabled' $text.values[1] = 'Custom' $text.values[2] = 'Homebase' skip if $homebase -> exists remove element from array $text.values at index 2 $default = $table.settings['price.type'] skip if $default $default = 0 $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3102 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$read.text, value array=$text.values, default=$default, return id='price.type', width=80 allowtabs=[FALSE]
if $homebase -> exists $default = $table.settings['return'] skip if $default $default = 0 $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3103 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$read.text, value array=$values.yesno, default=$default, return id='return', width=80 allowtabs=[FALSE] end
add section to custom menu: $menu $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3093 if size of table $table.data add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue='start.cmd' else set menu line option: $menu, selection colour=[MenuColour.Red] $ret = create menu return value: disabled, id='start.cmd' add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue=$ret end
$text.columns = array alloc: size=4 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=2163 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=120 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[0] = $text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102518 $text = create custom menu column string, position=-100 length=30 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[1] = $text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102519 $text = create custom menu column string, position=-80 length=20 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[2] = $text $read.text = read text: page=54 id=30 $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=80 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[3] = $text add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$text.columns
gosub sub.ComputeCargo
$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3092 if $cargo.free > 0 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text nextinput='add.new' value=null else $ret = create menu return value: disabled, id='add.new' set menu line option: $menu, selection colour=[MenuColour.Disabled] add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue=$ret end
if size of table $table.data add section to custom menu: $menu $array.sorted = sort table keys: table=$table.data
$size = size of array $array.sorted $i = 0 while $i < $size $ware = $array.sorted[$i] inc $i = $amt = $table.data[$ware] $ware.vol = get volume of ware $ware
$text.columns = array alloc: size=4 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=-130 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$ware $text.columns[0] = $text
$text = convert number $ware.vol to string $text = create custom menu column string, position=-100 length=30 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[1] = $text
$text.c = [MenuColour.Normal] $ware.tc = get transport class of ware $ware skip if $a.obj -> can transport ware $ware $text.c = [MenuColour.Red] $text = get short transport class name: class=$ware.tc $text = create custom menu column string, position=-80 length=20 right=[TRUE] colour=$text.c text=$text $text.columns[2] = $text
$text = convert number $amt to string $text = sprintf: fmt='[%s]', $text, null, null, null, null $ship.free = $cargo.free + ( $amt * $ware.vol ) $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=80 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[3] = $text
if $a.obj -> can transport ware $ware $ret = create menu return value: callback, value=$ware $ship.amt = $a.obj -> get amount of ware $ware in cargo bay add trade bar to menu: $menu, text=$text.columns, min=0, max=$ship.free, current=$amt, volume=$ware.vol, used=$ship.amt, return value=$ret, left text=$ware, right text='%CURRENT%' else set menu line option: $menu, selection colour=[MenuColour.Red] $ret = create menu return value: disabled, id=$ware add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text.columns returnvalue=$ret end
$default = $table.settings['price.type'] if $default == 2 $max.price = $homebase -> get price of ware $ware $text.columns = array alloc: size=2 $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3104 $text = create custom menu column string, position=150 length=0 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[0] = $text skip if $max.price $max.price = get max price of ware $ware $text = convert number $max.price to string $text = sprintf: fmt='%s %s', $text, [Text.Credits], null, null, null $text = create custom menu column string, position=-20 length=100 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[1] = $text add extra select line: menu=$menu, text=$text.columns else if $default == 1 $table.prices = $table.settings['prices'] if not $table.prices $table.prices = table alloc $table.settings['prices'] = $table.prices end $max.price = $table.prices[$ware] skip if $max.price $max.price = get average price of ware $ware
$text.columns = array alloc: size=2 $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3104 $text = create custom menu column string, position=150 length=0 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[0] = $text $text = convert number $max.price to string $text = sprintf: fmt='%s %s', $text, [Text.Credits], null, null, null $text = create custom menu column string, position=-20 length=100 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[1] = $text $min.price = get min price of ware $ware $price = get max price of ware $ware $ret = get type name from type code: type=$ware $ret = create menu return value: callback, value=$ret add price trade bar to menu: $menu, text=$text.columns, min=$min.price, max=$price, current=$max.price, return value=$ret end end end
$read.text = get command info: command=COMMAND_SHOPPING_LIST add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$read.text add info line section to menu: $menu
$info.pos = 100
$text.columns = array alloc: size=3 $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3097 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=$info.pos right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[0] = $text
$percent = fixed multiply and divide: $cargo.used * 100 / $cargo.max $text = create custom menu string progress: width=120 progress=$percent% $text = create custom menu column string, position=$info.pos length=120 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[1] = $text $text = convert number $cargo.used to string $text2 = convert number $cargo.max to string $text = sprintf: fmt='%s/%s', $text, $text2, null, null, null $text = create custom menu column string, position=$info.pos length=120 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[2] = $text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text.columns
set menu option: $menu, icon=3 set menu option: $menu, global hotkey=[Key.Identity], id='ware.id'
$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3091 $input = create input: id='shopping.menu' menu=$menu title=$read.text description=$a.obj callback=[Callback.Switch] endsub
sub.ComputeCargo: $cargo.free = $a.obj -> get free volume of cargo bay
$key = get next key: table=$table.data key=null while $key $amt = $table.data[$key] $ware.vol = get volume of ware $key $total.vol = $amt * $ware.vol $cargo.free = $cargo.free - $total.vol $key = get next key: table=$table.data key=$key end $cargo.max = $a.obj -> get cargo bay size $cargo.used = $cargo.max - $cargo.free endsub return null
